name: Hilton Templepatrick Hotel & Country Club

reviews.text: we were tired after our flight from cardiff to belast. we checked in and flopped right on the bed. it was a comfortable bed in a nice and big room.
reviews.title: The best hotel I have ever been to

likes.liked: — the loction and the leisure club

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed February 2006, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: the leisure centre was beautiful and free with a nights stay. However kids are allowed in the sauna and steamroom which is good for families but may disturb others.
reviews.title: Highly recommended!

reviews.text: the breakfast is gorgeous with lots of fresh fruit, traditional food and full cream milk.
reviews.title: Great to relax and unwind
Very average, not at all the standard expected from Hilton
reviews.text: there were no problems for me so go there if you want large rooms, excellent service, lovely leisure facilities and tasty breakfasts!
My partner and i stayed here for a valentines weekend getaway.
reviews.title: Can't wait to go back

reviews.text: There were many commendable things about this hotel. The staff were courteous and professional, the food was excellent, I had room service most nights. There was free wine in the room every night. I specifically switched to this hotel from my regular "Templeton" hotel because of the on site gym. This was well equiped and the staff were very helpful. On the whole the Hotel stay should have been very good indeed. Unfortunately, the whole experience was spoiled for me because the hotel clearly sells itself as a wedding venue. Where I come from weddings are weekend affairs, mostly Saturdays and usually starting mid day. In this hotel they had a wedding reception every evening running until the early hours. Some were more rowdy than others, but one particularly noisy party (a thursday)kept me, and I suspect the whole of the rest of the hotel, awake until 4am. The following saturday I had to travel back to the Midlands (England) by ferry, an 11 hour journey with 8 hours+ driving. I explained my problem to the front desk and they were most apologetic, but could only offer to move me to a room not much further from were I was, with no real advantages noise wise. Thankfully Friday nights' wedding was not so bad and I was able to sleep from about midnight, but I really think that wedding parties and business people who need to be up at 7am each day do not mix well in this hotel. A shame, but only really suitable heavy sleepers or party goers!
reviews.title: Too many weddings - not suitable for working folk

reviews.text: I stayed a the Hilton Templepatrick in early February 2006. Have not got one single complaint about the place!!!
reviews.title: A Top Notch Hotel

reviews.text: I availed of the special offer of 2 nights B&B with a 3 course evening meal on the 1st night...for two people...all for a measely £139!!!
reviews.title: great service

reviews.text: Breakfast was superb,self-service...the evening meal was prompt enough and my fussy eating habits were well catered for!!!...rooms OK enough...main hotel bar has a good selection of cocktails and a live band on Saturday evening...the golf bar has a jukebox that my partner and myself had childish fun with...the leisure club was superb!!!
reviews.title: Can we do more? - Not much!

reviews.text: I wouldn't hesitate staying at this hotel again!!!
reviews.title: Great location & facilities...but...
Wonderful Hotel
reviews.text: Just back today from a amazing weekend stay at the Hilton at Templepatrick.Wow what a fantastic place.My wife and i have never felt so relaxed as we are now.The staff went out of their way to make sure we were having a good time and could not do enough for us,but without being pushy.The rooms were among the most comfortable we have ever stayed in and the beds and pillows were so good it was hard to get out of bed!! For those who like to keep fit there is a brillant gym and pool.Most hotels just have a token gym but this one is supberb.Location is so peaceful and the food divine!! Cant wait to go back many more times.

Stayed for the weekend at this hotel. The staff are all very pleasant and helpful. Our room was a deluxe room, it had red and white wine, mineral and still water, pringles crisps, jelly bean sweets, and a computer. Overall the room was very clean. The food in the hotel was really excellent, had dinner on the first night, couldnt fault anything at all. The breakfast was good also, there was alot of selection.
reviews.title: absolutely brill
Hilton Templepatrick is the greatest
reviews.text: The swimming pool and leisure facilities were brill also. Templepatrick is a quiet place, on the second night, we dined in a local chinese the hotel suggested. It was lovely. As you can see I would recommend the Hilton hotel. Definetely would go back!

reviews.title: Loved the Hilton Templepatrick
reviews.text: Last week, we spent three days and nights at the Hilton Templepatrick.

aka: Hilton Templepatrick Hotel And Country Club
